references.paper_title: Deep generative modeling for single-cell transcriptomics
references.reason: This paper introduces a deep generative model for single-cell transcriptomics, which is foundational to the FCR model and is used extensively in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Variational autoencoders and nonlinear ICA: A unifying framework
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for identifiable deep generative models, which is crucial to the identifiability results presented in the FCR paper.

references.paper_title: Massively multiplex chemical transcriptomics at single-cell resolution
references.reason: This paper introduces the sciPlex dataset, a key dataset used for experiments in the FCR paper and a benchmark for single-cell perturbation experiments.

references.paper_title: Multiplexed single-cell transcriptional response profiling to define cancer vulnerabilities and therapeutic mechanism of action
references.reason: This paper introduces multiple datasets used for experiments in the FCR paper, providing large-scale data on cancer cell lines and drug responses.
This paper introduces the variational autoencoder (VAE) framework, which is the foundation of the FCR model and is used for the variational inference approach.
